oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Esperandieu home, 1856
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Home of Mr. Esperandieu, Knox County, TN. 'Taken from the west in 1856.' Unsigned lithograph. Shows house and outbuildings, ladder against building at left, two people on horseback in foreground. The Esperandieu family was Swiss American.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lithographs; Houses; Yards; Ladders; Horses;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
